name: MyDream
description: Build, terraform, quest, and explore your way across beautiful voxel-based worlds in MyDream!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP 32-bit Processor: Dual Core 2.0 GHz or equivalent processor Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® 8800 / ATI Radeon™ 2600 or better DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 650 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 64-bit or Windows 8 64-bit Processor: Quad Core 2.3GHz or equivalent processor Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® 560 Ti / ATI Radeon™ 6950 or better DirectX: Version 9.0 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 650 MB available space
